name: Stable Marriage (稳定婚姻)
description: 30+ years stable marriage. High Binding Energy expected.
notes: Male Water DM. Spouse Star = Fire (Wealth). Day Branch 午 = Fire = Spouse Palace aligned with Spouse Star.

name: Flash Divorce (闪婚闪离)
description: Short unstable marriage with multiple perturbations. Low Binding, High Perturbation.
notes: Male Fire DM. Spouse Star = Metal (Wealth). Day Branch 申 clashes with Year Branch 寅 = Structural instability.
